very good game

Back in 1998, Half Life 1 was released, It was ground-breaking. It won a lot of awards. But does the game still hold up? Yea I'd say it does.

However, there are some certain part that have aged. This game being released in 1998, does really show. 
-The Graphics are.. well obviously has aged quite badly. This isn't really fair though as this was of course back in 1998.
-The Movement is pretty janky, You feel pretty slippery and often times you'll accidentally fall of platforms from said slippery movement.
-The weapons are alright, They certainly do a some decent amount of damage.
-The gameplay is wonderful, I had a lot of fun playing this game. It could kill a decent amount of hours.
-The story is pretty alright. It's not too complicated and very simple.
-The music is incredible, I really really love the music. It fits the game nicely, and is really enjoyable.

Overall, If you have a few buck to spare. I'd recommend you buy this game. Like a lot of Valve games, It's pretty cheap on sale.
The most hilarious NPC voice lines of all time. Worth playing just for those scientist screams

Just a classic fps. I think it's still very fun and playable today. I don't care that much about graphics, but then again I grew up with an NES so my graphical standards are different than some. In any case, the controls are sharp and fast, the story is fun, and the action is fierce. Have fun Free man!

I went into this game expecting very low things, and it outperformed all my expectations. It was more fun than I expected, it was longer than I expected, there were more guns than I expected, the AI was smarter than I expected, and there was more story than I expected. Just an all around good experience that still holds up.

 O game apresenta momentos de combate, plataforma e puzzle:

Combate: Ã bem simples e fÃ¡cil de dominar, resumindo-se a atirar, o que torna o combate um pouco repetitivo mas Ã© reciclado de acordo com as diferentes armas.

Plataforma: A fÃ­sica Ã© impressionante para a Ã©poca, dominar a mecÃ¢nica de movimento do jogo Ã© essencial para os nÃ­veis que utilizam de parkour para desafiar o jogador.

Puzzle: Definitivamente esse Ã© o melhor ponto do game. Half-Life apresenta desafios mentais bem interessantes que utilizam do combate e momentos de plataforma para dificultar ainda mais os puzzles do jogo.

Portanto eu recomendo muito Half-Life, Ã© um clÃ¡ssico dos vÃ­deogames e deve ser jogado pelo maior nÃºmero de pessoas.

Obs: O jogo apresenta alguns bugs durante a jogatina que poderiam ter sido resolvidos depois de tanto tempo. Quebra um pouco a imersÃ£o mas nÃ£o estraga a experiÃªncia.
